Class StockMarketCrash

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Event
        • StockMarketCrash
  • public class StockMarketCrash
extends Event
    StockMarketCrash Event, Spawns 2 effects, and decreases value of sold items by 25 dollars.

    Spawns two effects, one of which is the arrow visual effect, the other being the flashing screen effect.

    Version:
    November 2022
    Author:
    Harishan Ganeshanathan

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      StockMarketCrash​(int d, boolean left, boolean right)
      Constructor for StockMarketCrash

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void act()
      In the act method, the StockMarketCrash event image will be added in the corner, it will animate the arrow, and if it has already been animated once , it will constantly set the image of the arrow to the final image of the arrow (when it is at its largest).
      void animateArrow()
      This method loops through an image array, preloaded with all the images for the arrow animation, and sets the image of the actor to the current iterated image in the array.
      void decreaseStock()
      Decreases the value of a shoe.

        addGreenFlash, addRedFlash, endEvent

    • Constructor Detail

      • StockMarketCrash

        public StockMarketCrash​(int d,
                        boolean left,
                        boolean right)
        Constructor for StockMarketCrash

        Sets instance variables, and creates an array of the down arrow images to be used in the animation.

        Parameters:
        d - Duration of the event
        left - If the event is on the left side of the screen
        right - If the event is on the right side of the screen

    • Method Detail

      • animateArrow

        public void animateArrow()
        This method loops through an image array, preloaded with all the images for the arrow animation, and sets the image of the actor to the current iterated image in the array.

      • act

        public void act()
        In the act method, the StockMarketCrash event image will be added in the corner, it will animate the arrow, and if it has already been animated once , it will constantly set the image of the arrow to the final image of the arrow (when it is at its largest).
        Overrides:
        act in class greenfoot.Actor

      • decreaseStock

        public void decreaseStock()
        Decreases the value of a shoe. Ex: If a shoe is originally worth $100, after decreaseStock() is called, its value will be $75.
